actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 and to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1977 and 1978 for carrying out that act.

summary.text: Amends the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to reduce the number of ex-officio members on the Board to reflect the merger of Radio Free Europe and Radio Liberty which are represented on the Board. Authorizes appropriations of $53,385,000 for fiscal year 1977 and such sums as are necessary for fiscal year 1978 for the operation of the Board.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 and to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1977 and 1978 for carrying out that act.
